whoWeAre.title:
Hermes
Logistic Company
whoWeAre.text:
We are Hermes Fleet Management, a leading technology provider offering an innovative solution to streamline vehicle fleet operations.

Our platform empowers companies to optimize their delivery routes, lower operational costs, and drive customer satisfaction. By leveraging our advanced reporting and real-time analysis, businesses can make strategic decisions for enhanced efficiency and profitability.

purposeAchieve.tab2: What do we want to Achieve?
purposeAchieve.title2: What do we want to Achieve?
purposeAchieve.text1: Use Intelligent Route Optimization to transform the way companies manage their vehicles fleet, using Hermes will help them to to optimize delivery routes. By considering factors like traffic, delivery windows, and package volume, businesses can reduce travel time, fuel consumption, and operational costs. The intelligent route optimization feature ensures efficient resource utilization and maximizes delivery efficiency.
purposeAchieve.text2: To lead the fleet management industry with cutting-edge technology and exceptional service, expanding nationally and internationally to positively impact the logistics of companies worldwide.

benefits.title: Time and Money Savings
benefits.description: The route optimization offered by Hermes solution allows companies to save time and money in the process of delivering their products. By planning routes efficiently, drivers can deliver more products in less time, reducing operating costs and increasing efficiency.

benefits.title: Increased Visibility and Control
benefits.description: Hermes solution provides complete visibility of the vehicle fleet, allowing companies to monitor the progress of deliveries and quickly respond to any issues or setbacks that arise. With Hermes solution, companies can have greater control over their delivery operations.

benefits.title: Improved Customer Satisfaction
benefits.description: With real-time monitoring and delivery to the correct areas thanks to geofencing, end customers receive their products on time, improving their satisfaction with the service and increasing customer loyalty.

benefits.title: Error and Delay Reduction
benefits.description: The route optimization offered by Hermes solution allows companies to save time and money in the process of delivering their products. By planning routes efficiently, drivers can deliver more products in less time, reducing operating costs and increasing efficiency.

benefits.title: Easy integration with existing systems
benefits.description: Hermes solution offers complete visibility of the vehicle fleet, allowing companies to monitor delivery progress and respond quickly to any problems or setbacks that may arise. With Hermes solution, companies can have greater control over their delivery operations and easily integrate with their existing systems.

pricing.title: Choose your plan according to your needs

plans.title: Plan Básico
plans.description: El Plan BASICO es ideal para pequeñas empresas o emprendedores que desean una solución de gestión de flotas eficiente y económica. Cubre todas tus necesidades sin importar cuán pequeña sea tu flota

plans.title: Plan Estándar
plans.description: El Plan ESTANDAR es perfecto para negocios medianos que buscan controlar y optimizar sus operaciones de flota. Ofrece una solución completa y escalable que se adapta a tus necesidades en crecimiento

plans.title: Plan Plata
plans.description: El Plan PLATA está diseñado para empresas en crecimiento con flotas considerables. Ofrece un control exhaustivo y opciones avanzadas de gestión para optimizar tus operaciones a gran escala

plans.title: Plan Empresarial
plans.description: El Plan EMPRESARIAL es la elección definitiva para las empresas más grandes con flotas extensas. Proporciona una solución de gestión de flotas a medida y de alto rendimiento que se adapta a tus necesidades a gran escala

items: Consultoría y Migración a la Nube

grid.title: Servers and Domain
items: Proxy Servers (Nginx, Kong, HAproxy, Traefik, Squid)
CDN Servers (AWS CloudFront, Google Cloud CDN, Cloud Flare)
Virtualization Servers (KVM. VMWare, Google Compute Engine, AWS EC2, Proxmox)
Monitor Serverless (AWS CloudWatch, Cloud Monitoring, ELK Stack, Prometheus, Data Dog)
Logging Serverless (AWS CloudWatch, Cloud Logging, ELK Stack, Data Dog)
Metric Servers (ELK Stack, Prometheus, Open Telemetry, Data Dog)
